TITLE: You
BODY: You: “I do mind, so you better get out of my face”

TITLE: You
BODY: “Duly noted, I’ll be outta here soon” [end]

TITLE: Edo
BODY: You: “I’m glad to see you”

TITLE: You
BODY: “Happy to hear it. What’s up?”

TITLE: Edo
BODY: You: “Do you recognize anything here?”

TITLE: You
BODY: “Believe it or not I do, the driver was a frequent hunter around these parts. Member of the Abra Hunting Club.” [goto21][unlock214]

TITLE: You
BODY: You: “Anything strange stick out to you?”

TITLE: You
BODY: “Those footprints do, they start and stop without warning. Maybe they jumped away.” [goto21]

TITLE: Edo
BODY: You: “Not much, what’s up with you?”

TITLE: You
BODY: “Doing my job I’m afraid” [end]

TITLE: You
BODY: [locked]You: “What do you know about the victim?”

TITLE: You
BODY: “He liked to talk a big game about how he could take on many of the supernatural elements that live around here, always spoutin’ off his plans.” [goto21]

TITLE: You
BODY: You: “I got some questions for you”

TITLE: Edo
BODY: “I bet you do”

TITLE: You
BODY: You: “Do you recognize anything here?”

TITLE: You
BODY: “I recognize the guy. Frequent hunter around these parts, member of the Abra Hunting Club.”

TITLE: Tech
BODY: “I notice his gun there too, but I wonder why he doesn’t have the rest of his equipment.” [goto31]

TITLE: You
BODY: You: “Anything strange stick out to you?”

TITLE: Tech
BODY: “Those footprints do, they start and stop without warning, and they definitely don’t look human”

TITLE: You
BODY: “Maybe it’s got other means of getting around.” [goto31]

TITLE: You
BODY: You: “Actually, I think I got all I need” [end]
